categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Porter Engle, known as the Blade of Bardotta, was a male Ikkrukkian Jedi Master and cook who lived during the High Republic Era. Sporting an enormous beard, Engle was once a legend within the Jedi Order, but eventually stepped down to become a humble cook, becoming known for his recipes, such as Nine-Egg Stew. During the Great Hyperspace Disaster, he was stationed at the Jedi Outpost on Elphrona.

When the Nihil kidnapped the wealthy Blythe family on Elphrona, Engle aided fellow Jedi Indeera Stokes, Loden Greatstorm and Loden’s Padawan, Bell Zettifar in a mission to rescue the family, a mission that was only partially successful.
